mapper.select: select count(*) from groupboard where GROUPBOARD_VISIBLE=1 and groupboard_groupnum=#{groupNum}

select * from (select rownum rnum, a.*, b.member_nickname from (select * from groupboard where GROUPBOARD_VISIBLE=1 and GROUPBOARD_GROUPNUM=#{groupNum} order by GROUPBOARD_CREATEDATE desc)a, member b where a.groupboard_writer=b.member_num)
mapper.insert: insert into groupboard(GROUPBOARD_NUM, GROUPBOARD_GROUPNUM, GROUPBOARD_WRITER, GROUPBOARD_SUBJECT, GROUPBOARD_CONTENT,GROUPBOARD_CREATEDATE, GROUPBOARD_MODIFYDATE, GROUPBOARD_VISIBLE, GROUPBOARD_READCOUNT) values(groupboard_num_seq.nextval, #{groupBoardGroupNum}, #{groupBoardWriter}, #{groupBoardSubject}, #{groupBoardContent}, sysdate, sysdate, 1, #{groupBoardReadCount})
mapper.update: update groupboard set GROUPBOARD_VISIBLE=0 where groupboard_num=#{groupBoardNum}
